short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record your screen, cam or both at the same time. share your video with your audience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Record and send high-quality personalized video messages to engage with your prospects and leads. Add interactive tools for better engagement like call-to-actions, annotations, email collector tools, and more! Send through email, social media, or embed on your own secure landing page and track engagement levels with advanced analytics.

Plus it integrates with your whole tech stack and email automation tools. 

Built for: 
Sales: Increase engagement and boost relationships with prospects through video.
Customer Success:  Record your screen and video to showcase tutorials and walkthroughs.
Internal Communication: Communicate ideas more effectively with video messaging.
Educators: Record lessons or give personalized learning experiences through video.
Marketing: Record product videos and demos with a human touch.
